name: vc-di-ecdsa-test-suite
description: Test suite for ensuring the data integrity of ecdsa-2019 signatures.

scripts.test: mocha tests/ --reporter @digitalbazaar/mocha-w3c-interop-reporter --reporter-options abstract="$PWD/abstract.hbs",reportDir="$PWD/reports",respec="$PWD/respecConfig.json",title="Data Integrity ecdsa 2019 Interoperability Report 1.0",suiteLog='./suite.log' --timeout 15000 --preserve-symlinks
